name: Graphia - Know your graphs
description:
One of the easiest way to learn mathematical graphs and functions.

You are shown a graph highlight along with a hint. You have to guess the graph. Sometimes it will also teach you about the graphical techniques that can help you figure out the function just by looking at the graph! how amazing is that!

NOTE : The web version is just for demonstration and trial purposes. The game was intended for Android platform. Kindly go to the android store link and download the game. 

NOTE : There is also a free version of the game at the link : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.gameophilix.graphiaFree

Features :
- Offline play, learn whenever and wherever!
- 100 graphs to learn! (Web version contains only 40)
- Intuitive techniques
- secrets!

we are always looking for feedback. If you think we are missing an important graph or want to give any feedback please feel free to drop an email.
